jun 13 at 1:46 pm lit a candle in memory of ruth ann rogers. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x kh kim harville. jun 13 at 12:10 pm lit a candle in memory of ruth ann rogers. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dd dennis and michelle dettmer. jun 12 at 5:08 pm to me ruth wasn't a sister-in-law, she was a sister. she was one of the kindest people i have ever met. dennis and i will miss her greatly. she would always be there for anyone who needed anything. i will miss our 3 hour phone conversations where we just talked about nothing and everything. i'm glad ruth and i had a chance recently to look at photos from our many camping trips. they say the good die young, and ruth you were one of the good ones. love, dennis and michelle dettmer ( part of the original wet ones )comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 12 at 4:36 pm country basket blooms was purchased for the family of ruth ann rogers. share on x pl pam lundgren. jun 12 at 2:48 pm ruth was my by brother glenn's wife and my sister-in-law. she was a very loving mother, grandmother, daughter-in-law and aunt to my 3 daughters. she was so giving and caring. i will miss our recent texts back and forth and her kind words. i recently called her "sleeping beauty" because she had finally gotten a very long nights sleep. and now she is truly at peace and at rest. i will miss her dearly. and i will always treasure the memory of the white dove that we saw at her home on the day of her passing. i know that it was a message from ruth. she is at peace and as always showing us her love. until we see you again. we love you ruth. love, pam, mark, alexandra, gabby and jacquelyn2 comments share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation.
